Package fr.cnrs.iees.uit

package fr.cnrs.iees.uit

uit stands for Universal Indexing Tree. It implements classes to to provide efficient searching of spatial data. The base class is an IndexingTree. It is a generalisation of a QuadTree, more accurately called a k-d tree.

It is based on work by Paavo Toivanen found here.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 12 ao√ªt 2021
